thread.title: Michael Moore Takes Founder's Award at Chicago International Film Festival
thread.title_full: Michael Moore Takes Founder's Award at Chicago International Film Festival

title: Michael Moore Takes Founder's Award at Chicago International Film Festival
text:
Michael Moore Takes Founder's Award a... Michael Moore Takes Founder's Award at Chicago International Film Festival Next Story Prev Story 14 hrs ago Read more: Hollywood Reporter 
The filmmaker sat with Chaz Ebert, widow of Roger Ebert, for a lively Q&A following the doc's Midwestern premiere. Michael Moore was presented with the Founder's Award for his latest film, Where To Invade Next , at the 51st Chicago International Film Festival.   Hollywood Reporter.
